name: Farm riot angry farmer
description:
Save your farm from rebellious chicken's and see what awaits
at the journey's end.
Enjoy 100 exciting levels and simple play control.
The player controls a paddle at the bottom of the screen and uses it to bounce a ball around the space.
A number of bricks occupy the top section of the screen, and hitting them with the ball eliminates them.
A classic block breaker game with a modern twist.
Different types of power-ups, variety of blocks trough level's, enemies, Interactive backgrounds and a gun (stress relief mode :D ).
Best Brick Breaker game that everyone can enjoy.
Many hours of pure fun and action, no age limits, it is a friendly game for all ages.
